metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1734 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the pipe lookup plugin of ansible. Arbitrary commands can be run, when the pipe lookup plugin uses subprocess.Popen() with shell=True, by overwriting ansible facts and the variable is not escaped by quote plugin. An attacker could take advantage and run arbitrary commands by overwriting the ansible facts.

criterions.comment: ansible package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
